alert.note: Alert for Clay; Lincoln; Turner; Yankton (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 30 at 5:21PM MDT until May 30 at 5:45PM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Clay County in southeastern South Dakota... Southwestern Lincoln County in southeastern South Dakota... Eastern Yankton County in southeastern South Dakota... Southeastern Turner County in southeastern South Dakota... * Until 645 PM CDT. * At 621 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Volin, or 11 miles east of Yankton, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Irene and Wakonda around 630 PM CDT. Beresford, Centerville and Viborg around 640 PM CDT. Hurley and Davis around 645 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Gayville and St. Helena Boat Dock. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
